enb_long_title: UNFCCC WORKSHOP ON BEST PRACTICES IN POLICIES AND MEASURES
sentences: The subsidiary bodies to the FCCC held their tenth sessions in Bonn, Germany, from 31 May - 11 June 1999, and began the process of fulfilling the BAPA.
SBSTA considered topics such as Annex I communications, methodological issues and the development and transfer of technology.
SBI discussed, inter alia, administrative and financial matters and non-Annex I communications.
SBI and SBSTA jointly considered the mechanisms of the Protocol, AIJ and compliance.
